Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Lawndale-Central Park
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Kedzie, 63rd, Pulaski and 59th due to street blockage near 59th/Lawndale-Central Park

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Kedzie, 63rd, Pulaski, and 59th due to street blockage near 59th/Lawndale-Central Park

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary West-bound Reroute near Roosevelt/Indepedence
ShortDescription: #12 Roosevelt West-bound buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Independence, Congress and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Independence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
West-bound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Independence, Congress and Roosevelt including the normal route streets, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Independence.

East-bound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
